00034 
00035 //
00036 // The 3D world
00037 //
00038 
00039 
00040 class World : public base::ReferencedObject, public base::Named
00041 {
00042 public:
00043   World(ref<base::VFileSystem> fs, ref<base::Cache> cache, const String& name = "") 
00044     : Named(name), vfilesystem(fs), theCache(cache) {}
00045   World(const World& w) 
00046     : Named(w), vfilesystem(w.vfilesystem), theCache(w.theCache) {}
00047   virtual ~World() {}
00048 
00049   virtual String className() const { return String("World"); }
00050 
00051   ref<base::Cache> cache() const { return theCache; }
00052   ref<base::VFileSystem> filesystem() const { return vfilesystem; }
00053 
00054   virtual void renderFrame() {}
00055 
00056 protected:
00057   ref<base::VFileSystem> vfilesystem;
00058   ref<base::Cache>       theCache;
00059 
00060 
00061 };
